product_name: EssenceLash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara Black Brown
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackEnhance your natural lashes with the iconic Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara, now available in a Black Brown shade! The conically shaped fiber wand delivers length and dramatic volume, creating a mesmerizing false lash effect to the lashes!
details: DetailsBenefitsOphthalmologically testedCruelty freeFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productsMicroplastic particlesParabensItem 2618249How To UseUsing essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara Black Brown, start at the base of the lash line and wiggle wand back and forth, adding as many coats as you like until desired length and volume is achieved. Remove mascara with essence Remove Like A Boss Waterproof Eye Make-up Remover.IngredientsAqua (Water), Paraffin, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Cera (Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax), Glyceryl Stearate Se, Polybutene, Butylene Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Tocopherol, Trimethyl Pentanyl Diisobutyrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Nitrate, Sodium Phosphate, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Using essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara Black Brown, start at the base of the lash line and wiggle wand back and forth, adding as many coats as you like until desired length and volume is achieved. Remove mascara with essence Remove Like A Boss Waterproof Eye Make-up Remover.
ingredients: Rhus Verniciflua Peel Cera (Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax)

reviews.headline: So worth the awesome price
reviews.comments: I love this mascara? Price, brush ever thing abut it

reviews.headline: Affordable but has fall out
reviews.comments: I have a love hate relationship with the mascara. When you first apply the mascara it gives a lifted look but over time this mascara has lots of fall out. You know those black specks that end up under your eyes or on your cheeks. I tend to get lots of that after 2-3 hours of having the mascara on. I also feel like the applictor is great for the top lashes but I feel like the big applicator makes it annoying to put on the bottom lashes. I will say for the price point this mascara is pretty good when it comes to lifting the lashes the biggest con for me is the fall out.

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments:
This product, is the best mascara I've used yet!
It makes my lashes. Curly. And long. And looks natural, I recommend it. 5 stars!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I like it

reviews.headline: Not a fan.
reviews.comments: I normally buy the pink tube of the I love xtreme mascara, but wanted to try a brown one instead. So this is the first one I saw. I do not love it. It does not have a very good color pay off and feels like you can barely see my lashes... and that's with multiple coats!! I did also notice, when I took it off at the end of the day, there wasn't much on my cotton pad from swiping it off. I will not repurchase this one.

reviews.headline: Not worth it...
reviews.comments: I wanted to try this out. I curled my lashes. And mind you, when I curl my lashes, they stay curled with almost any other mascara. But this one, they fully went flat once I put it on. I tried again and got similar results. Yes, this price is very low, but it would be worth it to invest a few more dollars towards a better mascara

reviews.headline: Did the formula change?
reviews.comments: I LOVED this mascara since it came out. I'm personally a big fan of spider leg looking eyelashes and the fact that it came in brown was chef's kiss. Just bought a new one June 2025 and i feel like the formula changed. It no longer gives me clumpy spider legs and it also now wants smear hours later.

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: Makes my lashes look long and thick. Can't beat the price.

reviews.headline: Do not wear this unless you hate yourself.
reviews.comments: This product is absolutely horrible. I wore this for the first time at home. In just a few hours I had the most horrible panda eyes I have ever experienced. Essence has some really great products, but this is not one of them.

reviews.headline: I love this product it works so well
reviews.comments: This is like one of the best products ever I love it soooooooo much and like I use it all the time it never really gets clumpy at all as long as you get the extra mascara off but you really have to layer it on for it to look good especially since it's brown

reviews.headline: luv luv luv
reviews.comments: would definitely recommend. i used the black one for years then found out they had a brown version and switched to that one bc i realized i have soft facial features and the harsh black mascara and eyeliner wasnt giving soft. after a long day i have minimal slippage and i have bery oily skin and eyes so thats great. and the color isnt too cool or too red its like a perfect brown.

reviews.headline: cute, but needs some work
reviews.comments: The applicator and color was great! (Although I do recommend wiping some of the product off on the side of the tube.) The only problem is that it wore off thru the day, and it started flaking below my eyes. The curl also does not hold, but very cute!

reviews.headline: Smudges
reviews.comments: I like how this looks, it is a true brown. If you don't apply too much you can get a great look. HOWEVER it does smudge! I don't put this on my bottom lashes but by end of day I have raccoon eyes.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: Honestly I believe this is better than the better than s*x one that is like quadruple the price, I don't remember if it was this one or the other one left like flakes under my eyes tho. I just wish they had brown waterproof mascara because my lashes dont hold a curl. Its not as brown as i'd like it to be its almost like a black brown.

reviews.headline: Mayor of clump town
reviews.comments: I love that the formula is brown but the terrible applicator doesnt help the clumpy, flaky product. It never makes it through the workday (in an air conditioned office) and I NEED to run a spooly through it after applying to make sure I leave the house with more than what looks to be about 6 eyelashes. Would recommend to an enemy

reviews.headline: pretty shade that lengthens and volumizes
reviews.comments: I like this mascara a lot as someone with lighter lashes, and it goes on nicely especially when it's warmed up. the only downside is that it does smudge later on.

reviews.headline: Love the Brown Mascara !
reviews.comments: I like to change up my look every now and then. Brown mascara has been my favorite by far !

reviews.headline: The best mascara I've tried!
reviews.comments: My mom got the black version of this mascara and I fell in love, so I decided to purchase the brown. I love this mascara even more than the it cosmetics superhero mascara. It holds my lashes really well without product fallout under my eyes

reviews.headline: Wouldn't recommend
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this but this mascara doesn't hold a curl and the mascara flakes off and leaves residue on my eyes by the end of a work day.

reviews.headline: I like it it's not real heavy
reviews.comments: Works great it's not real heavy and it helps to have eyelashes

media.headline: Wouldn't recommend for my fellow cry babies

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought this product, and as soon as my father saw it, he snatched it up and started using it for his lashes. He jokingly said he wanted to become a makeup influencer like James Charles to look sexier and make money. He even ended up divorcing my mother to pursue his new career. I decided to stick with him because it was fascinating to see how his "Sexy Makeup Influencer Male" journey would unfold. To my surprise, he actually started making money and gained fame, eventually even doing a collab with James Charles. I'm not kiddingâ€”check out the photo in the review. Yes, that's my dad, and I love him so much!
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect even my father likes to wear it

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this product, as ive always heard good things about this brand ans i love brown mascaras at a budget friendly price. Within just a few hours my eyes were tearing and absolutely burning. When i went to look in the mirror, the mascara had flaked and transferred a ton. It also made my eye lashes pull down as if the product was too heavy, i have never had with any other mascaras and have a natural curl to my lashes, so this was a big surprise. With how badly it made my eyes burn im hesitant to try again. As a disclaimer, I do have sensitive eyes, but have never had a mascara bother them so quick and have the irritation stick around after removing and using drops.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hate to hate it

rollup.name: Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara Black Brown
